custom-sql.sql: SELECT A.scienceAppId, A.name, ExtractValue(A.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') AS title, A.version, A.userId, F.data_ as universityId, B.scienceAppSeqNo, B.virtualLabId, A.manualId, A.groupId <isNotEmpty property="classId"> , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EDVIR_VirtualLabScienceAppLink B, EDVIR_VirtualLabScienceAppLinkClass C WHERE B.scienceAppId = A.scienceAppId AND B.scienceAppSeqNo = C.scienceAppSeqNo AND B.virtualLabId = #virtualLabId# AND C.classId = #classId# ) AS scienceAppCheck </isNotEmpty> FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp A, EDVIR_VirtualLabScienceAppLink B, (SELECT F.data_, F.classPK FROM ExpandoValue F WHERE F.columnId = #columnId#) AS F WHERE A.scienceAppId = B.scienceAppId AND A.userId = F.classPK AND A.status = '1901004' AND A.appType = 'Solver' <isNotEmpty property="virtualLabId"> AND B.virtualLabId = #virtualLabId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="scienceAppId"> AND B.scienceAppId = #scienceAppId# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT A.scienceAppId, A.name, ExtractValue(A.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') AS title, A.version, A.userId, B.scienceAppSeqNo, F.data_ as universityId, C.scienceAppClassSeqNo, C.classId, A.manualId, A.groupId FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp A, EDVIR_VirtualLabScienceAppLink B, EDVIR_VirtualLabScienceAppLinkClass C, (SELECT F.data_, F.classPK FROM ExpandoValue F WHERE F.columnId = #columnId#) AS F WHERE A.scienceAppId = B.scienceAppId AND B.scienceAppSeqNo = C.scienceAppSeqNo AND A.userId = F.classPK <isNotEmpty property="virtualLabId"> AND B.virtualLabId = #virtualLabId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="classId"> AND C.classId = #classId# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT DATA.* FROM( SELECT A.scienceAppId, A.name, A.version, A.userId, B.screenName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EDVIR_VirtualLabScienceAppLink B WHERE B.virtualLabId = #virtualLabId# AND B.scienceAppId = A.scienceAppId) AS virtuallabScienceAppCheck FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp A, User_ B WHERE A.status = '1901004' AND A.appType = 'Solver' AND A.userId = B.userId <isNotEmpty property="searchField"> AND A.name like '%@@searchField@@%' </isNotEmpty> ) AS DATA ORDER BY DATA.virtuallabScienceAppCheck DESC, DATA.name ASC

SELECT B.scienceAppClassSeqNo, B.scienceAppSeqNo, B.classId, A.scienceAppId, A.virtualLabId FROM EDVIR_VirtualLabScienceAppLink A, EDVIR_VirtualLabScienceAppLinkClass B WHERE A.scienceAppSeqNo = B.scienceAppSeqNo <isNotEmpty property="virtualLabId"> AND A.virtualLabId = #virtualLabId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="scienceAppId"> AND A.scienceAppId = #scienceAppId# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT A.scienceAppSeqNo, A.scienceAppId, A.virtualLabId FROM EDVIR_VirtualLabScienceAppLink A <isNotEmpty property="virtualLabId"> WHERE A.virtualLabId = #virtualLabId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="scienceAppId"> AND A.scienceAppId = #scienceAppId# </isNotEmpty>
